item.title: India Market Wrap: Nifty Holds 25,100 On Expiry Day; Tech Mahindra, LTIMindtree Lead IT Weakness
item.description: Tech Mahindra led the losers, while HDFC AMC and Patanjali bucked the trend. Wipro and Axis Bank reported muted numbers after the market hours.

item.title: Patanjali Breakout: Stock Gains On Bonus Share Approval, SEBI RA Sees Potential Retest Of ₹2,000
item.description: Technical indicators are backed by strong fundamentals due to the FMCG recovery

item.title: Swing Trade Idea: Can Fin Homes Can Rally Till ₹880 On Fresh Momentum, Says SEBI RA Pradeep Carpenter
item.description: The company is expected to report its Q1FY26 earnings update on July 19.

item.title: Stock Signals: From BSE Breakdown To Southern Petro’s Breakout, SEBI RA Flags Crucial Levels To Watch
item.description: Stocks like Southern Petro and JP Power show strength, while BSE remains under pressure on the technical charts.

item.title: India Dismisses Supply Threats From Trump’s Sanctions On Russian Oil: “We’ll Deal With It,’ Says Petroleum Minister
item.description: He reportedly stated that many new suppliers are entering the market, including those from Guyana, and India could also rely on supplies from existing...
